movie_title: The Never Ending Race to Build High
introduction: Visit http://brilliant.org/neo/ to get started learning STEM for free, and the first 200 people will
lead_intro: Have you ever wondered why the race to build the tallest building in the world is so challenging? Dive into the details of super tall skyscrapers and the complexities involved in this exciting quiz!

quiz.question: What organization sets standardized definitions for measuring building heights?
choices: Council on Tall Buildings and Urban Habitat
quiz.answer: Council on Tall Buildings and Urban Habitat
quiz.explanation: The Council on Tall Buildings and Urban Habitat is a Chicago-based organization that sets standardized definitions for measuring building heights.

quiz.question: Which building held the title of the tallest building for nearly 25 years before being surpassed by the Petronas Towers?
quiz.explanation: The Sears Tower in Chicago held the title of the tallest building for nearly 25 years until it was surpassed by the Petronas Towers.

quiz.question: Which two projects are currently under construction and have serious chances of becoming the tallest building in the world?
choices: Jeddah Tower in Saudi Arabia and Creek Tower in Dubai
Petronas Towers in Malaysia and Burj Khalifa in Dubai
Central Park Tower in New York and One World Trade Center
quiz.answer: Jeddah Tower in Saudi Arabia and Creek Tower in Dubai
quiz.explanation: The Jeddah Tower in Saudi Arabia and Creek Tower in Dubai are currently under construction and have serious chances of becoming the tallest building in the world.

quiz.question: What is the unique design element of the Creek Tower in Dubai?
choices: Held upright by a net of steel cables anchored to the ground
quiz.answer: Held upright by a net of steel cables anchored to the ground
quiz.explanation: The Creek Tower in Dubai is designed to be held upright by a net of steel cables anchored to the ground, a unique design element by architect Santiago Calatrava.

quiz.question: What online learning platform can teach you about scientific concepts like statics and mechanics?
quiz.explanation: Brilliant is an online learning platform that offers interactive lessons on scientific concepts like statics, mechanics, probabilities, astrophysics, and more.
